Package com.codewithej.realestateapi.service

Class PropertyServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.codewithej.realestateapi.service.PropertyServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyService
@Service public class PropertyServiceImpl extends Object implements PropertyService
Implementation of the PropertyService interface.

Handles business logic for property operations, including CRUD functionalities and search functionalities based on various criteria. Utilizes PropertyRepository for data access.
